name: jquery.tscroll.js
description: Tscroll provides custom replacements for stock vertical scrollbars.  Improvements include flexible styling, consistent cross-platform look, left-hand or right-hand placement, and better compatibility with map interfaces because the pointer will not be captured by a scroll area passing beneath it.
author: Michael S. Mikowski <mike.mikowski@gmail.com>
jquery_extra: Keys below are not used by the npm manifest
title: Custom vertical scroll bars
